data.speaker: EvilFriend
data.content: You created this little world for you to hide in, this fabrication.

data.speaker: EvilFriend
data.content: You made puzzles for yourself, that you could solve and feel CLEVER

data.speaker: EvilFriend
data.content: All to forget about the LARGE problem YOU caused

data.speaker: EvilFriend
data.content: Here's another logic puzzle you love so much...
